content: Hi, was trying out rust analyzer, and found out that when I have let x = String::from("hi"); and hover the x; the type information will say {unknown}, is this a bug?
I'm using vs code and the ra-lsp extension

@matthiaskrgr that is not currently implemented, but should be added relatively soon, as https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/1408 added the necessary groundwork for associated types support
